GroundFloorArea.description: For a house, the area of the ground floor (unit: mÂ²)

Standby.description: Appliance power consumption when not in use (unit: W)

gains_fraction.description: Proportion of appliance demand turned into heat gains (no unit)

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

area.description: Net area of the opaque building element (i.e. minus any windows / doors / etc.) (unit: mÂ²)

base_height.description: The distance between the ground and the lowest edge of the element (unit: m)

height.description: The height of the building element (unit: m)

orientation360.description: The orientation angle of the inclined surface, expressed as the geographical azimuth angle of the horizontal projection of the inclined surface normal, 0 to 360 (unit: Ë)

pitch.description: Tilt angle of the surface from horizontal, between 0 and 180, where 0 means the external surface is facing up, 90 means the external surface is vertical and 180 means the external surface is facing down (unit: Ë)

solar_absorption_coeff.description: Solar absorption coefficient at the external surface (dimensionless)

width.description: The width of the building element (unit: m)

base_height.description: The distance between the ground and the lowest edge of the element (unit: m)

frame_area_fraction.description: The frame area fraction of window, ratio of the projected frame area to the overall projected area of the glazed element of the window

g_value.description: Total solar energy transmittance of the transparent part of the window

height.description: The height of the building element (unit: m)

orientation360.description: The orientation angle of the inclined surface, expressed as the geographical azimuth angle of the horizontal projection of the inclined surface normal, 0 to 360 (unit: Ë)

pitch.description: Tilt angle of the surface from horizontal, between 0 and 180, where 0 means the external surface is facing up, 90 means the external surface is vertical and 180 means the external surface is facing down (unit: Ë)

width.description: The width of the building element (unit: m)

area.description: Area of this building element within the zone (unit: mÂ²)

area_per_perimeter_vent.description: Area of ventilation openings per perimeter (unit: mÂ²/m)

areal_heat_capacity.description: Areal heat capacity of the ground floor element (unit: J/m2.K)

depth_basement_floor.description: Depth of basement floor below ground level (unit: m)

height_basement_walls.description: Height of the basement walls above ground level (unit: m)

perimeter.description: Perimeter of the floor; calculated for the entire ground floor, even if it is distributed among several zones (unit: m)

pitch.description: Tilt angle of the surface from horizontal, between 0 and 180, where 0 means the external surface is facing up, 90 means the external surface is vertical and 180 means the external surface is facing down (unit: Ë)

psi_wall_floor_junc.description: Linear thermal transmittance of the junction between the floor and the walls (unit: W/m.K)

thermal_resistance_floor_construction.description: Total thermal resistance of all layers in the floor construction (unit: mÂ².K/W)

thermal_resist_insul.description: Thermal resistance of insulation on base of underfloor space (unit: mÂ².K/W)

thermal_resist_walls_base.description: Thermal resistance of walls of the basement (unit: mÂ².K/W)

thermal_transm_envi_base.description: Thermal transmittance of floor above basement (unit: W/mÂ².K)

thermal_transm_walls.description: Thermal transmittance of walls above ground (unit: W/mÂ².K)

total_area.description: Total area of the building element across entire dwelling; if the Floor is divided among several zones, this is the total area across all zones (unit: mÂ²)

u_value.description: Steady-state thermal transmittance of floor, including the effect of the ground (calculated for the entire ground floor, even if it is distributed among several zones) (unit: W/m2.K)

pitch.description: Tilt angle of the surface from horizontal, between 0 and 180, where 0 means the external surface is facing up, 90 means the external surface is vertical and 180 means the external surface is facing down (unit: Ë)

area.description: Area of this building element (unit: mÂ²)

pitch.description: Tilt angle of the surface from horizontal, between 0 and 180, where 0 means the external surface is facing up, 90 means the external surface is vertical and 180 means the external surface is facing down (unit: Ë)

thermal_resistance_unconditioned_space.description: Effective thermal resistance of unheated space (unit: mÂ².K/W)

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

temperatures.description: List of cold water temperatures, one entry per hour (unit: ËC)

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

schedule.description: List of boolean values where true means on, one entry per hour

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

schedule.description: List of cost values (one entry per time_series_step)

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

time_on_daily.description: Number of 'on' hours to be set per day

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

advanced_start.description: How long before heating period the system should switch on (unit: hours)

default_to_max.description: If both min and max limits are set but setpoint is not, whether to default to min (false) or max (true)

schedule.description: List of temperature values, one entry per hour (unit: ËC)

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

charge_level.description: Proportion of the charge targeted for each day

schedule.description: List of boolean values where true means 'on' (one entry per hour)

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

target_charge.description: (Ignored and likely not part of final specification)

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

required: Emissions Factor kgCO2e/kWh including out-of-scope emissions

enum: applicable but not taken into account

is_export_capable.description: Denotes that this energy supply can export its surplus supply

air_temperatures.description: List of external air temperatures, one entry per hour (unit: ËC)

daylight_savings.description: How daylight savings are handled in the climate data

diffuse_horizontal_radiation.description: List of diffuse horizontal radiation values, one entry per hour (unit: W/mÂ²)

direct_beam_conversion_needed.description: A flag to indicate whether direct beam radiation from climate data needs to be converted from horizontal to normal incidence; if normal direct beam radiation values are provided then no conversion is needed

direct_beam_radiation.description: List of direct beam radiation values, one entry per hour (unit: W/mÂ²)

end_day.description: Last day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

january_first.description: Day of the week for January 1st, Monday to Sunday, 1 to 7

latitude.description: Latitude of weather station, angle from south (unit: Ë)

leap_day_included.description: Whether climate data includes a leap day

longitude.description: Longitude of weather station, easterly +ve westerly -ve (unit: Ë)

shading_segments.description: Data splitting the ground plane into segments (8-36) and giving height and distance to shading objects surrounding the building

solar_reflectivity_of_ground.description: List of ground reflectivity values, 0 to 1, one entry per hour

start_day.description: First day of the time series, day of the year, 0 to 365

time_series_step.description: Timestep of the time series data (unit: hours)

wind_directions.description: List of wind directions in degrees where North=0, East=90, South=180, West=270. Values range: 0 to 360. Wind direction is reported by the direction from which it originates, e.g. a southernly (180 degree) wind blows from the south to the north. (unit: Ë)

wind_speeds.description: List of wind speeds, one entry per hour (unit: m/s)

ventilation_zone_base_height.description: Base height of the ventilation zone relative to ground (m)

MassDistributionClass.description: distribution of mass in building element, one of: 'I' - mass concentrated on internal side; 'E':  mass concentrated on external side; 'IE': mass divided over internal and external side; 'D':  mass equally distributed; 'M':  mass concentrated inside

SFP.description: Specific fan power, inclusive of any in use factors (unit: W/l/s)

base_height.description: The distance between the ground and the lowest edge of the PV panel (unit: m)

height.description: Height of the PV panel (unit: m)

inverter_is_inside.description: Whether the inverter is considered inside the building

inverter_peak_power.description: Peak power; represents the peak electrical power input to the inverter (unit: kW)

orientation360.description: Orientation angle of the inclined surface, expressed as the geographical azimuth angle of the horizontal projection of the inclined surface normal, 0 to 360 (unit: Ë)

peak_power.description: Peak power; represents the electrical power of a photovoltaic system with a given area and a for a solar irradiance of 1 kW/mÂ² on this surface (at 25 degrees) (unit: kW)

pitch.description: The tilt angle (inclination) of the PV panel from horizontal, measured upwards facing, 0 to 90 (unit: Ë)

width.description: Width of the PV panel (unit: m)

cooling_capacity.description: Maximum cooling capacity of the system (unit: kW)

Zone.description: The zone where the unit(s) is/are installed

daily_losses.description: Measured standby losses due to cylinder insulation at standardised conditions (unit: kWh/24h)

min_temp.description: Minimum temperature required for domestic hot water (unit: ËC)

pressure_difference_ref.description: Reference pressure difference for an air terminal device (unit: Pa)

area_roof.description: Surface area of the roof of the ventilation zone (unit: mÂ²)

env_area.description: Reference area of the envelope airtightness index

is_open.description: This field should be a boolean - any string provided will be ignored and treated as a null.

area.description: Useful floor area of the zone (unit: mÂ²)

temp_setpnt_init.description: Setpoint temperature to use during initialisation (unit: ËC)
